00019 // Load all camera and window init variables
00020 bool ScriptManager::LoadWindowInitLua(int &width, int &height, std::string &name, bool &fullScreen)
00021 {
00022         // Create lua state
00023         lua_State* Environment = lua_open();
00024         if (Environment == NULL)
00025         {
00026                 // Show error and exit program
00027                 std::cout << "Error Initializing lua.." << std::endl;
00028                 getchar();
00029                 exit(0);
00030         }
00031 
00032         // Load standard lua library functions
00033         luaL_openlibs(Environment);
00034 
00035         // Load and run script
00036         if (luaL_dofile(Environment, "res/scripts/WindowInit.lua"))
00037         {
00038                 std::cout << "Error opening file.." << std::endl;
00039                 getchar();
00040                 return false;
00041         }
00042 
00043         // Read from script
00044         lua_settop(Environment, 0);
00045         lua_getglobal(Environment, "screenWidth");
00046         lua_getglobal(Environment, "screenHeight");
00047         lua_getglobal(Environment, "screenTitle");
00048         lua_getglobal(Environment, "fullScreen");
00049 
00050         // Set values
00051         width = (int)lua_tonumber(Environment, 1);
00052         height = (int)lua_tonumber(Environment, 2);
00053         name = lua_tostring(Environment, 3);
00054         fullScreen = lua_toboolean(Environment, 4);
00055 
00056         // Close environment
00057         lua_close(Environment);
00058 
00059         // Return true for successful loading and reading
00060         return true;
00061 }

00081         {

00097 
00098         // Set values
00099         camPos.x = (int)lua_tonumber(Environment, 1);
00100         camPos.y = (float)lua_tonumber(Environment, 2);

00102         yaw = (float)lua_tonumber(Environment, 4);

00104         fov = (float)lua_tonumber(Environment, 6);

00108         // Close environment

00110

00115 // Load all textures
00116 bool ScriptManager::LoadTexturesInitLua()
00117 {
00118         // Create lua state
00119         lua_State* Environment = lua_open();
00120         if (Environment == NULL)
00121         {
00122                 // Show error and exit program
00123                 std::cout << "Error Initializing lua.." << std::endl;
00124                 getchar();
00125                 exit(0);
00126         }
00127 
00128         // Load standard lua library functions
00129         luaL_openlibs(Environment);
00130 
00131         // Load and run script
00132         if (luaL_dofile(Environment, "res/scripts/TexturesInit.lua"))
00133         {
00134                 std::cout << "Error opening file.." << std::endl;
00135                 getchar();
00136                 return false;
00137         }
00138 
00139         // Read from script
00140         lua_settop(Environment, 0);
00141         lua_getglobal(Environment, "AllTextures");
00142 
00143         // File path of texture to load
00144         std::string filePath;
00145 
00146         // Push to first table
00147         lua_pushnil(Environment);
00148 
00149         // Keep reading while there is data in table
00150         while (lua_next(Environment, -2) != 0)
00151         {
00152                 // Push to next table
00153                 lua_pushnil(Environment);
00154                 while (lua_next(Environment, -2) != 0)
00155                 {
00156                         // Push to next table
00157                         lua_pushnil(Environment);
00158                         while (lua_next(Environment, -2) != 0)
00159                         {
00160                                 // Get file path and load it
00161                                 filePath = lua_tostring(Environment, -1);
00162                                 TextureManager::Instance().LoadTexture(filePath);
00163 
00164                                 // Pop out of current table
00165                                 lua_pop(Environment, 1);
00166                         }
00167                         // Pop out of current table
00168                         lua_pop(Environment, 1);
00169                 }
00170                 // Pop out of current table
00171                 lua_pop(Environment, 1);
00172         }
00173 
00174         // Close environment
00175         lua_close(Environment);
00176 
00177         // Return true for successful loading and reading
00178         return true;
00179 }

00181 // Load all model data
00182 bool ScriptManager::LoadModelsInitLua(std::unordered_map<std::string, ModelsData> &allModelData, ModelsData &modelData)
00183 {
00184         // Create lua state
00185         lua_State* Environment = lua_open();
00186         if (Environment == NULL)
00187         {
00188                 // Show error and exit program
00189                 std::cout << "Error Initializing lua.." << std::endl;
00190                 getchar();
00191                 exit(0);
00192         }
00193 
00194         // Load standard lua library functions
00195         luaL_openlibs(Environment);
00196 
00197         // Load and run script
00198         if (luaL_dofile(Environment, "res/scripts/ModelsInit.lua"))
00199         {
00200                 std::cout << "Error opening file.." << std::endl;
00201                 getchar();
00202                 return false;
00203         }
00204 
00205         // Read from script
00206         lua_settop(Environment, 0);
00207         lua_getglobal(Environment, "AllModels");
00208 
00209         // File path of model to load
00210         std::string filePath;
00211 
00212         // Name of current model being read in
00213         std::string modelName;
00214         std::string texFilePath;
00215 
00216         // Different types of data being read in
00217         std::string values[9];
00218         values[0] = "filePath";
00219         values[1] = "texFilePath";
00220         values[2] = "scaleX";
00221         values[3] = "scaleY";
00222         values[4] = "scaleZ";
00223         values[5] = "posX";
00224         values[6] = "posY";
00225         values[7] = "posZ";
00226         values[8] = "AI";
00227 
00228         //temp values
00229         std::string temp;
00230         std::vector<float> tempData;
00231         glm::vec3 tempPos;
00232         glm::vec3 tempScale;
00233         bool isAI = false;
00234 
00235         // Push to first table
00236         lua_pushnil(Environment);
00237 
00238         // Keep reading while there is data in table
00239         while (lua_next(Environment, -2) != 0)
00240         {
00241                 // Get current model name being read in
00242                 modelName = lua_tostring(Environment, -2);
00243                 
00244                 // Push to next table
00245                 lua_pushnil(Environment);
00246                 while (lua_next(Environment, -2) != 0)
00247                 {
00248                         // Push to next table
00249                         lua_pushnil(Environment);
00250                         while (lua_next(Environment, -2) != 0)
00251                         {
00252                                 // Load data into correct variable
00253                                 temp = lua_tostring(Environment, -2);
00254                                 if (temp.compare(values[0]) == 0)
00255                                         filePath = lua_tostring(Environment, -1);
00256                                 if (temp.compare(values[1]) == 0)
00257                                         texFilePath = lua_tostring(Environment, -1);
00258                                 if (temp.compare(values[2]) == 0)
00259                                         tempScale.x = lua_tonumber(Environment, -1);
00260                                 if (temp.compare(values[3]) == 0)
00261                                         tempScale.y = lua_tonumber(Environment, -1);
00262                                 if (temp.compare(values[4]) == 0)
00263                                         tempScale.z = lua_tonumber(Environment, -1);
00264                                 if (temp.compare(values[5]) == 0)
00265                                         tempPos.x = lua_tonumber(Environment, -1);
00266                                 if (temp.compare(values[6]) == 0)
00267                                         tempPos.y = lua_tonumber(Environment, -1);
00268                                 if (temp.compare(values[7]) == 0)
00269                                         tempPos.z = lua_tonumber(Environment, -1);
00270                                 if (temp.compare(values[8]) == 0)
00271                                         isAI = lua_toboolean(Environment, -1);
00272 
00273                                 // Pop out of current table
00274                                 lua_pop(Environment, 1);
00275                         }       
00276                         // Pass in filePath to modelData
00277                         modelData.filePath = filePath;
00278                         modelData.texFilePath = texFilePath;
00279 
00280                         // Pass in model scales and push to modelData
00281                         tempData.push_back(tempScale.x);
00282                         tempData.push_back(tempScale.y);
00283                         tempData.push_back(tempScale.z);
00284                         modelData.modelScales.push_back(tempData);
00285 
00286                         // Clear for next batch of data
00287                         tempData.clear();
00288 
00289                         // Pass in positions and push to modelData
00290                         tempData.push_back(tempPos.x);
00291                         tempData.push_back(tempPos.y);
00292                         tempData.push_back(tempPos.z);
00293                         modelData.modelPositions.push_back(tempData);
00294 
00295                         // Clear for next batch of data
00296                         tempData.clear();
00297 
00298                         // Pass in if AI or not
00299                         modelData.isAI.push_back(isAI);
00300 
00301                         // Pop out of current table
00302                         lua_pop(Environment, 1);
00303                 }
00304                 // Add to map
00305                 allModelData[modelName] = modelData;
00306 
00307                 // Clear vectors of any data before adding more, and reset string
00308                 modelData.modelPositions.clear();
00309                 modelData.modelScales.clear();
00310                 modelData.filePath = "";
00311                 modelData.isAI.clear();
00312 
00313                 // Pop out of current table
00314                 lua_pop(Environment, 1);
00315         }
00316 
00317         // Close environment
00318         lua_close(Environment);
00319 
00320         // Return true for successful loading and reading
00321         return true;
00322 }

00324 // Load all heightmap data
00325 bool ScriptManager::LoadHeightmapsInitLua(std::unordered_map<std::string, HeightmapsData> &allHeightmapData, HeightmapsData &heightmapsData)
00326 {
00327         // Create lua state
00328         lua_State* Environment = lua_open();
00329         if (Environment == NULL)
00330         {
00331                 // Show error and exit program
00332                 std::cout << "Error Initializing lua.." << std::endl;
00333                 getchar();
00334                 exit(0);
00335         }
00336 
00337         // Load standard lua library functions
00338         luaL_openlibs(Environment);
00339 
00340         // Load and run script
00341         if (luaL_dofile(Environment, "res/scripts/TerrainsInit.lua"))
00342         {
00343                 std::cout << "Error opening file.." << std::endl;
00344                 getchar();
00345                 return false;
00346         }
00347 
00348         // Read from script
00349         lua_settop(Environment, 0);
00350         lua_getglobal(Environment, "AllHeightmaps");
00351 
00352         // File path of heightmap and texture applied
00353         std::string filePath;
00354         std::string texFilePath;
00355         std::string heightfieldType;
00356 
00357         // Different types of data being read in
00358         std::string values[9];
00359         values[0] = "filePath";
00360         values[1] = "texFilePath";
00361         values[2] = "fileSize";
00362         values[3] = "scaleX";
00363         values[4] = "scaleY";
00364         values[5] = "scaleZ";
00365         values[6] = "posX";
00366         values[7] = "posY";
00367         values[8] = "posZ";
00368 
00369         //temp values
00370         std::string temp;
00371         glm::vec3 tempPos;
00372         glm::vec3 tempScale;
00373         int size;
00374 
00375         // Push to first table
00376         lua_pushnil(Environment);
00377 
00378         // Keep reading while there is data in table
00379         while (lua_next(Environment, -2) != 0)
00380         {
00381                 // Get type of heightfield
00382                 heightfieldType = lua_tostring(Environment, -2);
00383 
00384                 // Push to next table
00385                 lua_pushnil(Environment);
00386                 while (lua_next(Environment, -2) != 0)
00387                 {
00388                         // Push to next table
00389                         lua_pushnil(Environment);
00390                         while (lua_next(Environment, -2) != 0)
00391                         {
00392                                 // Load data into correct variable
00393                                 temp = lua_tostring(Environment, -2);
00394                                 if (temp.compare(values[0]) == 0)
00395                                         filePath = lua_tostring(Environment, -1);
00396                                 if (temp.compare(values[1]) == 0)
00397                                         texFilePath = lua_tostring(Environment, -1);
00398                                 if (temp.compare(values[2]) == 0)
00399                                         size = lua_tonumber(Environment, -1);
00400                                 if (temp.compare(values[3]) == 0)
00401                                         tempScale.x = lua_tonumber(Environment, -1);
00402                                 if (temp.compare(values[4]) == 0)
00403                                         tempScale.y = lua_tonumber(Environment, -1);
00404                                 if (temp.compare(values[5]) == 0)
00405                                         tempScale.z = lua_tonumber(Environment, -1);
00406                                 if (temp.compare(values[6]) == 0)
00407                                         tempPos.x = lua_tonumber(Environment, -1);
00408                                 if (temp.compare(values[7]) == 0)
00409                                         tempPos.y = lua_tonumber(Environment, -1);
00410                                 if (temp.compare(values[8]) == 0)
00411                                         tempPos.z = lua_tonumber(Environment, -1);
00412 
00413                                 // Pop out of current table
00414                                 lua_pop(Environment, 1);
00415                         }
00416                         // Pass in filePath and texFilePath and size to heightmapsData
00417                         heightmapsData.filePath = filePath;
00418                         heightmapsData.texFilePath = texFilePath;
00419                         heightmapsData.fileSize = size;
00420 
00421                         // Pass in model scales and push to modelData
00422                         heightmapsData.modelScales.push_back(tempScale.x);
00423                         heightmapsData.modelScales.push_back(tempScale.y);
00424                         heightmapsData.modelScales.push_back(tempScale.z);
00425 
00426                         // Pass in positions and push to modelData
00427                         heightmapsData.modelPositions.push_back(tempPos.x);
00428                         heightmapsData.modelPositions.push_back(tempPos.y);
00429                         heightmapsData.modelPositions.push_back(tempPos.z);
00430 
00431                         // Add to map (should only be ONE terrain heightfield, and this is used to set cam height later)
00432                         if(heightfieldType == "terrain")
00433                                 allHeightmapData[heightfieldType] = heightmapsData;
00434                         else
00435                                 allHeightmapData[filePath] = heightmapsData;
00436 
00437                         // Clear vectors of any data before adding more, and reset strings
00438                         heightmapsData.modelPositions.clear();
00439                         heightmapsData.modelScales.clear();
00440                         heightmapsData.fileSize = 0;
00441                         heightmapsData.filePath = "";
00442                         heightmapsData.texFilePath = "";
00443 
00444                         // Pop out of current table
00445                         lua_pop(Environment, 1);
00446                 }
00447                 // Pop out of current table
00448                 lua_pop(Environment, 1);
00449         }
00450 
00451         // Close environment
00452         lua_close(Environment);
00453 
00454         // Return true for successful loading and reading
00455         return true;
00456 }
